  <script>
   try {
          const observer = new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
            for (const ClsEntry of list.getEntries()) {
              if (!ClsEntry.hadRecentInput) {
                console.log('CLS-------------------------------------->>>>>>>')
                console.log(ClsEntry.sources, ClsEntry.value)
                console.log('CLS--------------------------------------<<<<<<<')
              }
            }
          });

          observer.observe({type: 'layout-shift', buffered: true});

        } catch (e) {
      
        }
  </script>
  <script>
   let firstHiddenTime = document.visibilityState === 'hidden' ? 0 : Infinity;
        document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', (event) => {
          firstHiddenTime = Math.min(firstHiddenTime, event.timeStamp);
        }, {once: true});

        try {
          let lcp;

          function updateLCP(entry) {
            if (entry.startTime < firstHiddenTime) {
              lcp = entry.startTime;
              console.log('- lcp:', entry.startTime, entry.element)
            }
          }

          const po = new PerformanceObserver((entryList, po) => {
            entryList.getEntries().forEach((entry) => updateLCP(entry, po));
          });

          po.observe({
            type: 'largest-contentful-paint',
            buffered: true,
          });

          addEventListener('visibilitychange', function fn(event) {
            if (document.visibilityState === 'hidden') {
              removeEventListener('visibilitychange', fn, true);

              po.takeRecords().forEach((entry) => updateLCP(entry, po));
              po.disconnect();
            }
          }, true);
        } catch (e) {
          
        }
  </script>

  <script>
   window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []
        window.googletag = { cmd: [] }
        window.dfpOptions = {
          infiniteScroll: {
            hasFetchedDFP: false,
            slugs: []
          },
          email: {
            options: {},
            set: false,
            empty: null,
          },
        }

        // 1x2 infinite scroll fn
        window.addDfpInfiniteScrollArticles = (slugs = []) => {
          window.dfpOptions.infiniteScroll.slugs = slugs
          window.dfpOptions.infiniteScroll.hasFetchedDFP = true
        }

        // 1x3 email slider fn
        window.populateMarketingSlider = (options = {}) => {
          window.dfpOptions.email.options = options
          window.dfpOptions.email.set = true
        }

        // 1x3 email slider event
        window.googletag.cmd.push(() => {
          window.googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', event => {
            if (event.slot.getSlotElementId() !== 'emailslider1-1') {
              return
            }

            if (event.isEmpty) {
              window.dfpOptions.email.empty = true
              return
            }

            window.dfpOptions.email.empty = false
          })
        })
  </script>
  <script defer="" src="https://unpkg.com/web-vitals@0.2.4/dist/web-vitals.es5.umd.min.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   function sendVitalsToDataLayer (label) {
          return function (data) {
            const multiplier = label === 'LCP' ? 1: 1000
            const valueInMS = Math.round(data.value * multiplier)
            window.dataLayer.push({
              event: 'web vitals ' + label,
              vitals: valueInMS
            })
          }
        }

        window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
          webVitals.getCLS(sendVitalsToDataLayer('CLS'));
          webVitals.getFID(sendVitalsToDataLayer('FID'));
          webVitals.getLCP(sendVitalsToDataLayer('LCP'));
          webVitals.getFCP(sendVitalsToDataLayer('FCP'));
          webVitals.getTTFB(sendVitalsToDataLayer('TTFB'));
        });
  </script>

          <a href="/accessibility/">
           Accessibility
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
